datosLaboralesPOJO.descripcion: Profesor a tiempo completo del Departamento de Finanzas e Investigador del Centro de Investigación de la Universidad del Pacífico

	Chief of Staff and Advisor for Peru to World Bank Executive Director (ED) for Argentina, Bolivia, Chile, Paraguay, Peru and Uruguay.
	Provides analysis and recommendations for a wide array of World Bank Group projects (cross sector, cross country) with emphasis in Africa, Latin America and rural development projects.
	Senior level advisor to Executive Director for International Finance Corporation (IFC) capital increase (US$ 5.5 billion) and International Bank for Reconstruction and Develop

Managed projects implemented in Latin America, Africa and Asia including: o	Risk management and agricultural insurance projects in Ethiopia, India, Egypt and Uruguay. Index-based insurance products adopted and scaled-up. Proponent of innovative Picture Based Insurance.o The behavior of international agricultural commodity markets and price transmission analysis from international markets to domestic food markets in developing countries (Africa, Latin America, Asia).
o	Analysis of futures.

	Implemented applied research projects on several development topics including the macroeconomic impact of poor tax enforcement and monitoring and assessing the impact of the 2008 food crisis to inform policy responses.

Coordination and participation in development projects for international agencies and national governments including:o	Jamaica: Inter-American Development Bank: Informal Sector in Jamaica
o	Ecuador: Inter-American Development Bank: Economic Evaluation of the Extension Services Modernization Program - PROMSA 	
o	Peru: UNDP- Millennium Poverty Reduction Targets in Latin America Micro-simulations to quantitively assess poverty targets.
o	Peru
